answers.answer: Anemic just means you have low iron, so you could possibly have both, but what you ate that day can affect the results of the test. That is the reason why you have to fast before the 3 hour test.
Alright then. I don't know much about all these things I'm a ftm.
I'm just concerned because I'm so late already I'm 36 weeks going to be 37 so I'm scared for baby.

question: so I got my glucos test results back. It was a 193. I'm confused. You can be anemic and have diabetes or was it because I ate syrup and pancakes that morning?
title: Glucose test high results
